CustomField.description: Hour period of when the record was last sent through RR.
CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(RR_Last_Routed__c)),
IF( FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24) = 0, TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24)+12)&" - "& TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24)+1)&" AM",
IF( FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24) < 12, TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24))&" - "& TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24)+1)&" AM",
IF( FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24) = 23, TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24)-12)&" - "& TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24)-11)&" AM",
TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24)-12)&" - "& TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 4/24),1) *24)-11)&" PM")))
,'')
CustomField.label: RR Timeframe
